MC: Suppose the flip-flop above had a setup time 2 ns and the unsynchronized input a changed as shown in the timing diagram. Which of the following choices best describes what would happen to the state Q?
column3: HTML
The signal Q be forced into the incorrect state due to a setup time violation
The signal Q will be forced into the incorrect state due to a hold time violation
The signal Q stay in the correct state despite the setup time violation
The signal Q will be in an unknown state, which may or may not be correct
